abstract: The proposal contains a few unfriendly surprises for the banks, including provisions that scrutinize how banks collect revenue, award compensation and track their compliance with the Volcker Rule.
snippet: The proposal contains a few unfriendly surprises for the banks, including provisions that scrutinize how banks collect revenue, award compensation and track their compliance with the Volcker Rule.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)

lead_paragraph: Wall Street loathes change. That could explain its displeasure with the Volcker Rule.

headline.main: With Volcker Rule, Wall Street Braces for Change
